content: ..ROUND#7, Date 18/11/23 - 24/11/2023..GUESSING MECHANICSEnter your guess in USD before 24th November 2023 @23:59 UTCRULES AND TERMS- To participate, you need to be a Sherbet player. If you don't have an account with us yet, please register using the provided link.- Each participant can make only one prediction during the specified round.- You must have at least 50 posts on Bitcointalk before October 31st.- Once submitted, you cannot edit your post.- Three winners will be determined based on the Bitcoin price at Coinmarketcap on December 01, 2023, at 10:00 UTC.- The closest predictions will receive $150, $50, and $50, respectively, in BTC or an equivalent currency set on your account.- Rewards will be sent to your Sherbet account and withdraw-able anytime.- Sherbet management reserves the right to edit, update, or cancel this game at any time.POST FORMATCode:Sherbet username:Prediction: $xx,xxx.xx

comments.body: Congratulations,Quote from: playsherbet on December 01, 2023, 10:53:51 AMHi, Sherbet Community01ST DECEMBER @10:00 UTC BITCOIN PRICE : $38,705.21First place #1 (+$80.76)Quote from: komisariatku on November 24, 2023, 12:15:45 AMSherbet username: rryuk_Prediction: $38,785.97Second place #2 (-$84.21)Quote from: Haunebu on November 24, 2023, 04:43:19 AMSherbet username: HaunebuPrediction: $38,621Third place #3 (+$182.69)Quote from: Mame89 on November 23, 2023, 09:53:59 AMSherbet username: Mame89Prediction: $38,887.90Congratulations to the winners, our team will send the prizes to your Sherbet accountRegards,Jt
